Actions.Text: REFERRED TO ETHICS AND INTERNAL GOVERNANCE
REFERRED TO ETHICS AND INTERNAL GOVERNANCE

Title: Repeals provisions of law restricting public access to records of the joint commission on public ethics and the legislative ethics commission
Summary: Repeals provisions of law restricting public access to records of the joint commission on public ethics and the legislative ethics commission.
LawCode: Rpld ยง94 sub 19, Exec L; rpld ยง80 sub 12, Leg L
ActClause: AN ACT to repeal subdivision 19 of section 94 of the executive law and subdivision 12 of section 80 of the legislative law, relating to records that are available for public inspection
